infotexts.entitydescription.multitool: Allows repairs and basic functions of the wrench, screwdriver, and crowbar in a single tool.
infotexts.entitydescription.taser: A more convenient way to neutralize threats without using lethal force.
infotexts.entitydescription.stunmagazine: The battery for the taser, holds 4 shots. Can be recharged.
infotexts.entitydescription.chefuniform1: Be proud to wear your apron.
infotexts.entitydescription.sugar: Some tasty sugar for sweetening foods.
infotexts.entitydescription.flour: A leavening agent for various baked goods. Eating it raw is probably a poor decision.
infotexts.entitydescription.batter: A thick batter for pastries or breading.
infotexts.entitydescription.beerbatter: A thick batter with a little extra something.
infotexts.entitydescription.omlette: A fine omlette made from the freshest eggs around...
infotexts.entitydescription.poundcake: A delicious poundcake, a bit heavy though.
infotexts.entitydescription.bread: Just some standard bread, take what you can get.
infotexts.entitydescription.burger: A delicious burger, above and beyond the rations expected on a submarine.
infotexts.entitydescription.fillet: An amazing beer battered fish fillet, certainly the finest food around.
infotexts.entitydescription.cheese: Fresh cheese! One of the only fresh things around.
infotexts.entitydescription.glue: Sticky adhesive for putting things back together, even people!
infotexts.entitydescription.moonpie: One of the lesser known medical cures, used on conditions from lacerations to gunshot wounds!
infotexts.entitydescription.milk: A tasty drink, great for baking pastries!
infotexts.entitydescription.almond: Tasty nuts, great for candy or can be broken down into milk
infotexts.entitydescription.minidischargecoil: A tiny discharge coil with a shorter range, intended to stun anything that might be swimming in a flooded room.
infotexts.entitydescription.kitchen: A small all-in-one kitchen device that can be used to make food for the crew.
infotexts.jobdescription.chef: Every ship needs a cook, the chef will cook up delicious meals that can help the crew complete various tasks. Yes Chef!
infotexts.traitormutinystartmessage: We think the command on this ship is sorely lacking in judgement, sandby for further instructions
infotexts.traitormutinyobjective1: Alright, we need to deal with the captain, but first we need someone to take their place. Go find yourself a captain's cap, there should be one behind a vent or in the crew quarters.
infotexts.traitormutinyinfotext1: Find a captain's cap behind a vent or in the crew quarters.
infotexts.traitormutinyobjective2: Great, now we need to give the captain what's coming to 'em. Eliminate the captain quietly, or loudly if you think the crew will support you.
infotexts.traitorreactorstartmessage: We need you to slow down this ship, stay on the line for your orders.
infotexts.traitorreactorobjective1: This ship needs to stop, completely. Destroying some of their fuel rods will force a resupply.
infotexts.traitorreactorobjective2: The engineering crew is too vigilant, we need to slow them down as well.
infotexts.traitorreactorobjective3: Alright, new orders. This ship is going down, meltdown the reactor.
infotexts.traitoreaster2startmessage: There is a mudraptor egg on board, we won't fail this time.
infotexts.traitoreaster2objective2: We need to eliminate their ability to fight the oncoming hoards, destroy some of their ammo.
infotexts.traitorpacifismstartmessage: I don't like the way security runs things around here... We need a nonviolent answer.
infotexts.traitorpacifismobjective1: Security has gone too far, they need to be eliminated for peace to endure.
infotexts.traitorpacifismobjective2: Weapons are carriers of violence, we can befriend these creatures instead of killing them!
infotexts.traitorfirestartmessage: Don't you just love the glow of a hot fire?
infotexts.traitorfireobjective1: Find the grenade in the vents, it makes the sizzle...
infotexts.traitorfireobjective2: Don't let them destroy the sizzle and crackle...
infotexts.traitorfireinfotext3: Kill a crew member with fire.
